column4: what is the fastest way to change the default port of a ssh server?
sudo nano /etc/ssh/sshd_config       and then change port and save
did you restart the SSH server?
are you connecting over the internet or lan?
open the tcp for the new  port
maybe windows is not allowing connections to the ssh server?
install nmap and do nmap localhost -p PORT
port is not opened to the internetz
are you using putty to connect ?
sure it's not a DNS problem ? :p
if you just changed port in sshd_config it should work..
